summary.purpose: TypeScript type definitions for Vite environment variables including Firebase configuration and API keys
summary.problem_solved: Provides type safety and IDE autocomplete for environment variables in a Vite application

symbols.name: ImportMetaEnv
symbols.description_one_line: Type definition for Vite import.meta.env environment variables

details.what_it_does: Defines all available environment variables with their types and purposes, including Firebase configuration, API keys, and application mode settings

returns.description: Interface defining all typed environment variables

minimal_correct.title: Accessing typed environment variables

extensive_correct.title: Using all environment variables in application setup

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Missing VITE_ prefix

symbols.name: ImportMeta
symbols.description_one_line: Global ImportMeta interface with typed env property

details.what_it_does: Extends the global ImportMeta interface to provide typed access to environment variables through import.meta.env

returns.description: Global import.meta object with typed env property

minimal_correct.title: Accessing import.meta.env with type safety
minimal_correct.code:
const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_API_KEY; // TypeScript knows this is a string
const projectId = import.meta.env.VITE_PROJECT_ID; // Full type safety

extensive_correct.title: Using import.meta in application initialization

incorrect_pattern.title: Common mistake: Not extending ImportMeta interface
